verses.verse: <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> an <S%G652>apostle<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> by the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> to the <S%G40>saints<s%> who are at <S%G2181>Ephesus,<s%> and [who are] <S%G4103>faithful<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> Jesus: <S%G2424><s%>
<S%G5485>Grace<s%> to you and <S%G1515>peace<s%> from <S%G2316>God<s%> our <S%G3962>Father<s%> and the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

<S%G2128>Blessed<s%> [be] the <S%G2316>God<s%> and <S%G3962>Father<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> who has <S%G2127>blessed<s%> us with <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> <S%G2129>blessing<s%> in the <S%G2032>heavenly<s%> [places] in <S%G5547>Christ,<s%>

<S%G2531>just<s%> as He <S%G1586>chose<s%> us in Him <S%G4253>before<s%> the <S%G2602>foundation<s%> of the <S%G2889>world,<s%> that we should be <S%G40>holy<s%> and <S%G299>blameless<s%> <S%G2714>before<s%> Him. In <S%G26>love<s%>

He <S%G4309>predestined<s%> us to <S%G5206>adoption<s%> as <S%G5206>sons<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> to <S%G846>Himself,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G2107>kind<s%> <S%G2107>intention<s%> of His will,
to the <S%G1868>praise<s%> of the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of His <S%G5485>grace,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> He <S%G5487>freely<s%> <S%G5487>bestowed<s%> on us in the <S%G25>Beloved.<s%>

In Him we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G629>redemption<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> His <S%G129>blood,<s%> the <S%G859>forgiveness<s%> of our <S%G3900>trespasses,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4149>riches<s%> of His <S%G5485>grace,<s%>
<S%G3739>which<s%> He <S%G4052>lavished<s%> upon us. In <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> and <S%G5428>insight<s%>

He <S%G1107>made<s%> <S%G1107>known<s%> to us the <S%G3466>mystery<s%> of His will, <S%G2596>according<s%> to His <S%G2107>kind<s%> <S%G2107>intention<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> He <S%G4388>purposed<s%> in Him

with a <S%G1519>view<s%> to an <S%G3622>administration<s%> <S%G3588>suitable<s%> to the <S%G4138>fulness<s%> of the <S%G2540>times,<s%> [that is], the <S%G346>summing<s%> up of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> things in the <S%G3772>heavens<s%> and things upon the <S%G1093>earth.<s%> In Him

<S%G2532>also<s%> we have <S%G2820>obtained<s%> an <S%G2820>inheritance,<s%> having been <S%G4309>predestined<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to His <S%G4286>purpose<s%> who <S%G1754>works<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G1012>counsel<s%> of His will,
to the <S%G1519>end<s%> that we who were the <S%G4276>first<s%> to <S%G4276>hope<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> should be to the <S%G1868>praise<s%> of His <S%G1391>glory.<s%>

In Him, you <S%G2532>also,<s%> after <S%G191>listening<s%> to the <S%G3056>message<s%> of <S%G225>truth,<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of your <S%G4991>salvation<s%> â€“ having <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4100>believed,<s%> you were <S%G4972>sealed<s%> in Him with the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G1860>promise,<s%>

<S%G3739>who<s%> is <S%G728>given<s%> as a <S%G728>pledge<s%> of our <S%G2817>inheritance,<s%> with a <S%G1519>view<s%> to the <S%G629>redemption<s%> of [God's own] <S%G4047>possession,<s%> to the <S%G1868>praise<s%> of His <S%G1391>glory.<s%>

For <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1223>reason<s%> I <S%G2532>too,<s%> having <S%G191>heard<s%> of the <S%G4102>faith<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> which [exists] <S%G2596>among<s%> you, and your <S%G26>love<s%> for <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G40>saints,<s%>
do not <S%G3973>cease<s%> <S%G2168>giving<s%> <S%G2168>thanks<s%> for you, while <S%G4160>making<s%> <S%G3417>mention<s%> [of you] in my <S%G4335>prayers;<s%>

that the <S%G2316>God<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> of <S%G1391>glory,<s%> may <S%G1325>give<s%> to you a <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> and of <S%G602>revelation<s%> in the <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> of Him.

[I pray that] the <S%G3788>eyes<s%> of your <S%G2588>heart<s%> may be <S%G5461>enlightened,<s%> <S%G1519>so<s%> that you may <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> is the <S%G1680>hope<s%> of His <S%G2821>calling,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> are the <S%G4149>riches<s%> of the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of His <S%G2817>inheritance<s%> in the <S%G40>saints,<s%>

and <S%G5101>what<s%> is the <S%G5235>surpassing<s%> <S%G3174>greatness<s%> of His <S%G1411>power<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> us who <S%G4100>believe.<s%> [These are] in <S%G2596>accordance<s%> with the <S%G1753>working<s%> of the <S%G2904>strength<s%> of His <S%G2479>might<s%>

<S%G3739>which<s%> He <S%G1754>brought<s%> <S%G1754>about<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> when He <S%G1453>raised<s%> Him from the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> and <S%G2523>seated<s%> Him at His <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G1188>hand<s%> in the <S%G2032>heavenly<s%> [places],

<S%G5231>far<s%> <S%G5231>above<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G746>rule<s%> and <S%G1849>authority<s%> and <S%G1411>power<s%> and <S%G2963>dominion,<s%> and <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> that is <S%G3687>named,<s%> not <S%G3440>only<s%> in <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G165>age,<s%> but <S%G2532>also<s%> in the one to <S%G3195>come.<s%>

And He <S%G5293>put<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> in <S%G5293>subjection<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> His <S%G4228>feet,<s%> and <S%G1325>gave<s%> Him as <S%G2776>head<s%> <S%G5228>over<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> to the <S%G1577>church,<s%>
<S%G3748>which<s%> is His <S%G4983>body,<s%> the <S%G4138>fulness<s%> of Him who <S%G4137>fills<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> in <S%G3956>all.<s%>
